monsters.name: Goblin
monsters.description: A small green humanoid with a big nose and a mischievious streak. Though clever, they're famously cowards.

monsters.name: Dragon
monsters.description: A huge lizard like reptile with great wings that breaths fire, stay away if you value your life and your gold.

monsters.name: Skeleton
monsters.description: A shambling pile of bones reanimated by some evil magic.

monsters.name: Unicorn
monsters.description: A strange horse-like creature witha single horn. They're rare and said to be good omens.

monsters.name: Orc
monsters.description: Bigger than a goblin, but dumber too. These brutes will bash your head in just to take your boots that don't fit them.
